div.bibl: Jewish Labor World, Sept. 8, 1916. THE WORKERS INSTITUTE AT 920 S. ASHLAND BLVD.

body.p: Announces the opening of the second year of teaching English for beginners, from A. B. C.
High School - Preparatory for all Colleges and Universities.
Not a diploma factory, but an original school for radical workers under the personal supervision of Comrade Tobinson.
Business and Commercial, University and College Courses, at Lowest Prices.
The Place is Limited. Register Now!
